Name: Statement-non-opinion
Example: Me, I'm in the legal department.

Name: Yes-No-Question
Example: Do you have to have any special training?

Name: Conventional-closing
Example: Well, it's been nice talking to you.

Name: Hedge
Example: I don't know if I'm making any sense or not.

Name: Declarative Yes-No-Question
Example: So you can afford to get a house?

Name: Other
Example: Well give me a break, you know.

Name: Quotation
Example: You can't be pregnant and have cats

Name: Summarize/reformulate
Example: Oh, you mean you switched schools for the kids.

Name: Or-Clause
Example: or is it more of a company?

Name: 3rd-party-talk
Example: My goodness, Diane, get down from there.

Name: Offers, Options, Commits
Example: I'll have to check that out

Name: Self-talk
Example: What's the word I'm looking for

Name: Declarative Wh-Question
Example: You are what kind of buff?
